= cURL =

cURL can be used for a variety of different web requests.


= Examples =

{{{bash
curl --include https://localhost:5000/test-json
}}}
>Gives request headers in addition to output

== Requests ==

{{{bash
curl https://localhost/which-method
}}}
>This is a GET request

{{{bash
curl --data "first=Minako&last=Arisato" https://localhost/which-method
}}}
>This is a post request

{{{bash
curl -X PUT -d "first=Minako&last=Arisato" https://localhost/which-method
}}}

{{{bash
curl -X DELETE https://localhost/which-method
}}}
